item.title: 20 Power Words for Your Digital Content
item.description:
20 Power Words for Your Digital Content

The way we communicate is constantly evolving, and the Digital Age has ushered in a new way of speaking to and engaging with our audience. The words we use on our digital platforms determines the level of in-the-moment engagement we'll have with our visitors, and influences how strongly our brand will perform in recall.

item.description:

We have all kinds of clients - clients who want to change the world, clients who want to change their marketspace, clients who want to change lives, etc. And they all have one thing in common: they want to grow. One of the best ways to grow our businesses is through collaboration.

item.title: A Surprising Trait of an Effective Leader | eaHELP - Virtual Assistants
item.description:
A Surprising Trait of an Effective Leader | eaHELP - Virtual Assistants

Would you believe me if I told you that one of the least celebrated marks of a leader is that they're boring? Yes, boring. Bor-ing. Boring. Toman Chamorro-Premizic, Ph.D. and a professor of Business Psychology, says that the nicer word for a "boring" leader is probably "emotionally mature," but I like the shock factor.

We can look at the altruistic version of the word - a concern for the well-being of another, putting others ahead of yourself. When it comes to leadership, however, I think it's much more effective to look at it in the ...

item.title: Collaboration and Teamwork: What's the Difference? | eaHELP - Virtual Assistants
item.description:
Collaboration and Teamwork: What's the Difference? | eaHELP - Virtual Assistants

On a quiet Labor Day weekend in 1995, a computer programmer coded a public website that would allow him (and others) to auction off items no longer needed. To his surprise, by February 1996, his website had grown to a $3 billion business with more than 2 million subscribers.
